summary: REQ-14 (header) and REQ-15 (favicon link) appear implemented via a new shared BrandLogo component used in TopNav and Footer and an updated index.html favicon reference. REQ-13 is not evidenced because no static image assets were added in the diff summary. REQ-14 is only partially met because the Footer still contains text branding (“© {year} SolviroStudio”).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the original uploaded logo to frontend static assets and include at least two optimized variants under frontend/public/assets/generated (header/nav and square favicon/app icon), with transparent background where applicable and crisp rendering.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff references /assets/generated/... PNGs in code, but the diff summary does not show any added image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (or any documented assets folder) or any evidence that the original uploaded file was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all current text-only “SolviroStudio” branding in the site header/navigation and footer with the new logo image (keeping accessible alt text and stable layout).
missing_requirements.reason: Footer now includes the logo image, but still renders the text “© {currentYear} SolviroStudio. All rights reserved.” which is text-only branding and not replaced by the logo.
